text: Pen ensel tɨgawup ak, akɨl ne ak pugek, sub, takan, gap okok day omɨŋal nokom tek agɨl, day omɨŋal tek yek, day nokom olap sɨkom tek pak yu gɨl, mɨlek tep pel gup tek ma gak. Sub ak tɨmel gɨl, takan gap okok tɨmel gɨl, day omɨŋal nokom tek agɨl, day omɨŋal tek yek, day nokom olap mɨlek golɨgup tek ma gak.
